Comment: Actually, they have used USA to become what China is today, and most probably leaving USA behind.  They simply do not need USA. No one talks in USA, but they have educated 1,5 million mathematicians, physicist and engineers in USA universities for the last 20 years.   They have transferred all sorts of production knowledge in their country. They can simply produce anything USA can produce. Their technology and science is as least as good as USA. It is not recognized yet.  They are now flirting with EU. They have eliminated all tariffs from Africa. They have been building strong relationship with South America.  So, frankly speaking, USA already lost this battle. All these years while China was getting stronger, USA was bombing Middle East. What a stupid strategy.
